ygData.subject: Re: Some Equipment Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, jagged bands are an excellent choice. As upgrades to your earrings, I would go with gold amber earrings (+3 str - 60pp/pair) or electrum sapphire earrings
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, jagged bands are an excellent choice.

As upgrades to your earrings, I would go with gold amber earrings (+3 str -
60pp/pair) or electrum sapphire earrings (+4 str +2 int - 400pp/pair).

Prices are estimates.

Larn, 50th Rank, Brell Serilis

>From: Worlord <worlord99@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Monks] Some Equipment Questions
>Date: Sat, 18 Dec 1999 17:59:02 -0800 (PST)
>
>I recently managed to buy some Jagged Bands which I
>have used to replace my Gold Carnelian rings (+5 agi).
> was this a good choice?
>
>I currently use onyx earrings (+2 agi). I want to
>update this. what should I be looking for
>
>Thanks

>Hammeron Stonespirit
